reviewText: Good learning video, but not for the beginner fly fisherman.
Too much focus on the sales of the products, would have liked to see more technical insights.
very well done comprehensive tutorial on fishing large and/or articulated streamers.  Lots of good fish catching video and good explanation of all the variables in this kind of fishing.

No real structure to this DVD. The first 2/3 of the video are product placement. Very little real instruction on this video. Tons of talking with very little substance. This DVD should be about $5. Spend $30 on a good book instead.

Kelly dose a great job for beginners, and experienced fisherman alike. You don't have to be an advanced level to get valuable information from this. Kelly explains things in a simple down to earth way that makes it easy. Lots of good fishing wisdom.
